items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy this dress!
items.body: This dress is amazing! Great quality, price, and extremely flattering! I can't say enough good things about it. The colors are very pretty and the style is fantastic. I bought this to wear to an outdoor wedding in Colorado and felt so good in it. I got lots of compliments and it was one of the most flattering and comfortable dresses I've ever worn. I was able to dance in it, walk in it, and eat in it and it was perfect all night. Looking to get it in more colors I loved it so much! For size reference: I got a Medium. I'm 5'6" about 163lbs and 36C. Medium fit perfect - it does have stretch but also form fitting. Fits true to size. Read more
items.author: Sarah Hendrickson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overpriced but gorgeous dress. Worth it.
items.body: OBSESSED. This dress is everything. I am 5’8 and 165lbs, curvy on the bottom. The dress has a ton of stretch. Out of the bag it’s TINY, but don’t let that fool you. If you are between sizes and a little larger in the chest area I suggest going with the bigger size. The chest area is a little small. The bottom of the dress is so small with so much stretch that it will fit a wide array of bottom sizes. The top does not have as much give. Read more
items.author: Jennifer Mullen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous, Sexy, but Runs Big — Size Down!
items.body: I absolutely loved this dress! The design is stunning — the tie-dye pattern and cowl neck give it such a high-end look, and the material looks far more expensive than it is. The side slit is very sexy but still tasteful, not over-the-top, which I appreciated. However, the sizing was off for me. A small was recommended, but it was too big, so I would definitely suggest sizing down. Overall, absolutely gorgeous dress and very flattering. Read more
items.author: SD

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love it and would buy this same style in different colors
items.body: This dress was very comfortable and flattering. For the price, it's 100% worth buying. I am 5'3 "and weigh 120 lbs, and a size small fits perfectly. The material felt a little thin when I first pulled it out of the package, but once it's on, it looks great. The length was perfect for me, and it would still be great for someone shorter or taller. I recommend purchasing if you are undecided. Read more
items.author: Gabby_R.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for date night
items.body: Ordered a size small simply because I wanted a tighter fit for our Vegas night out. I'm a 34DD-28-38 and it was definitely fitted LOL, but exactly what I wanted. The dress itself was much greener than the photos, but still beautifully made. Super soft fabric and well constructed straps held through the night of dancing. I loved the short skirt underneath, but didn't have to worry about pulling it down because of the sheer overlay. Made it functional and sexy for the night! Read more
items.author: Michelle Mackenzie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Give it a try….
items.body: I hesitated buying this dress because I thought it might be too tight and revealing but it actually fit perfectly and was really comfortable. The colors are vibrant and I thought it might be too loud but again, with a tan, it was just right. For reference I'm 5’5” and 130lbs. Read more
items.author: sheila

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress but disappointed with quality control
items.body: The dress is beautiful in terms of color and design—exactly what I was hoping for style-wise. The fabric has a soft, slightly sheer overlay with a vibrant watercolor effect that makes it stand out. It fits well and has a flattering silhouette with a fun slit detail. However, I was really disappointed to find that the inner lining was sewn in inside out. As you can see in the second photo, the visible seam and stitching are clearly not how the lining was intended to be finished. It cheapens the look and feel of the dress and makes it seem poorly constructed. At almost any price, I expected better quality control. I’m torn because I do love the look from the outside, but it’s frustrating O will be returning this because of the liner. If this issue were corrected, I’d easily give it 5 stars. For reference I am 5’7”, 125lb Read more
items.author: Lexapple

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love!!
items.body: Stunning dress! Great quality, comfortable, & beautiful Read more
items.author: Ray Malmquist

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dusty Purple, Multicoloured Tie Dye, Purple Multi, Orange Floral, Green Multi, Solid Watermelon Pink, Orange Tie Dye, Army Green, Red Multi, Teal Blue, Blue Tie Dye, Coral Pink Multi, Dark Green, Rose Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
